Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: Your problem is you're... too busy holding onto your unworthiness

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: I can go all over the world with Skype

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: My guru said that when he suffers, it brings him closer to God. I have found this, too

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: Only that in you which is me can hear what I'm saying

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think you're free, there's no escape possible

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be still and still moving. Content even in your discontent

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: Each of us finds his unique vehicle for sharing with others his bit of wisdom

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: Inspiration is God making contact with itself

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are already in Detroit, you don't have to take a bus to get there

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: Our plans never turn out as tasty as reality

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: Through love one acquires renunciation and discrimination naturally

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to go east, don't go west

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: When the flower blooms, the bees come uninvited

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: The fabled musk deer searches the world over for the source of the scent which comes from itself

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: God is in all men, but all men are not in God; that is why we suffer

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: Work, apart from devotion or love of God, is helpless and cannot stand alone

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easy to talk on religion, but difficult to practice it

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: If you must be mad, be it not for the things of the world. Be mad with the love of God

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: Many are the names of God and infinite the forms through which He may be approached

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless one always speaks the truth, one cannot find God Who is the soul of truth

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: Let come what comes, let go what goes. See what remains

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: The body dies, but the spirit that transcends it cannot be touched by death

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is also conversation

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: Our own self-realization is the greatest service we can render the world

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: Without understanding yourself, what is the use of trying to understand the world?

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: Consciousness is indeed always with us. Everyone knows 'I am!' No one can deny his own being

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not the perishable body, but the eternal Self

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to meditate is through meditation itself

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: All activities and events that a body is to go through are determined at the time of conception

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually pretty shy in real life. But I guess in front of the camera, I focus

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness exists only if you have a lot of people to share it with

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I am young enough to try my hands at all kinds of cinema

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to reach the heights of stardom beyond my imagination

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never been vain. I don't take myself seriously. I don't consider myself sexy or good-looking

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Bombay Velvet' is my most romantic film, it's my 'Titanic' or 'Gone With The Wind.'

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think you can force a moral opinion or you can force something through a Bollywood film

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I myself am a great James Dean fan. He had this aura and enigma about him

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I am arrogant enough to know that I am a good actor and people will like me for my work

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I will go for an arranged marriage, but I am not against arranged marriages

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Does the owner of the restaurant own his restaurant? Or does the government own his restaurant?

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: America is a world leader, but we should not be its policeman or ATM

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: What America needs is not just another politician or more promises. What America needs is a revival

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you hate poor people or do you just hate poor people with jobs?

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: A Tea Party tidal wave is coming

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to live in a nanny state where people are telling me where I can go and what I can do

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell people I won't vote to go to war unless I'm ready to go or send my kids

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody is looking for an election where they can do something and participate

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: You shouldn't have one opinion when you're running and another when you're president

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: The main thing I say on war is that we need to obey the law and formally declare war

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: Never, ever underestimate the importance of having fun

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the game

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: An injured lion still wants to roar

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought every day was a gift, but now I am looking for where to send the thank you note

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is what you get when you didn't get what you wanted

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a finite amount of time. Whether short or long, it doesn't matter. Life is to be lived

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: If I don't seem as depressed or morose as I should be, sorry to disappoint you

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never understood pity and self-pity as an emotion

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: Wait long enough, and people will surprise and impress you

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to raise awareness of pancreatic cancer - people who get it don't live long enough

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't fake listening. It shows

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't stand that my husband was being unfaithful. I am Raquel Welch - understand?

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a duality in every man and every woman

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a sex symbol was rather like being a convict

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: When I first came along in the business, they didn't really like the idea of my name being Raquel

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: In school, nobody could pronounce my name. They just called me Rocky

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a bigger-than-life persona before I was anyone in my own mind

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not imperceptible to masculine charm, but, well, you know, I can flirt

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: Myra Breckenridge is the antithesis of sex symbol. She's revolutionary; she's a warrior

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind can also be an erogenous zone

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Chemotherapy is brutal. The goal is pretty much to kill everything in your body without killing you

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I think every girl has that a guy she has trouble letting go of

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I know what it's like to have my heart broken. It is not adorable

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, dating has become a sport and not about finding the person you love

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't believe this, but Hollywood really is a meritocracy

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can surround myself with hilarious people every day, I will always want to go to work

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I am generally cast as the dependable, affable, loving, friend-wife-girlfriend

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I think part of being an adult is leaving the fairytale behind

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of skepticism about marriage and monogamy

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: People are not enjoying life because they're trying to be something or brand themselves

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: The day I am not able to fly will be a sad day for me

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: Power and wealth are not two of my main stakes

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: I would say that one of the things I wish I could do differently would be to be more outgoing

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there are many honest businessmen

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: Banana republics are run on cronyism

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: People still believe what they read is necessarily the truth

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: What are the crumple zones on scooters? The helmet is the only crumple zone I can think of

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: Challenges need to be given to an organization

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: I buy a lot of electronics, some which I never take out of the box!

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: I've often felt that the Indian tiger has not been unleashed

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: When men don't fear God, they give themselves to evil

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: I am surprised that anyone can profess to be an atheist

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: It is embarrassingly unscientific to speak of anything creating itself from nothing

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Atheistic evolution isn't an intelligent belief, as atheists would have the black community believe

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is as essential to the spiritual realm as oxygen is to the natural realm

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Believing that there is no God does not mean that there isn't one

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: God doesn't believe in atheists

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Creation is absolute, 100 percent scientific proof that there was a Creator

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is a wonderful discipline, to which we are deeply indebted

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: An atheist is someone who thinks (but doesn't believe) that nothing created everything

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: He who lives by the crystal ball will eat shattered glass

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is a machine. The family is a machine. The life cycle is like a machine

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: There are two main drivers of asset class returns - inflation and growth

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: Constantly probe the people who report to you, and encourage them to probe you

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: Pull in your belt, spend less, and reduce debt

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get caught up in the moment

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: An economy is not a complicated thing; it just has a lot of moving parts

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is still in deleveraging

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost everything is like a machine

Quote.Author: Ray Dalio
Quote.QuoteValue: The economy is like a machine

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're green, your growing. When you're ripe, you rot

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not a risk taker, you should get the hell out of business

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity is a highfalutin word for the work I have to do between now and Tuesday

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: We provide food that customers love, day after day after day. People just want more of it

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: We take the hamburger business more seriously than anyone else

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only as good as the people you hire

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: None of Us is as Good as All of Us

Quote.Author: Ray Kroc
Quote.QuoteValue: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about being a versatile athlete and training in all realms of life

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever your path is, that's your path

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be careful of people who like to talk a big game but can't back it up

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to be willing to walk in a storm. That's what I tell people all the time

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't train for football; I train more for a lifestyle

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know a man on this Earth who can outwork me

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter the circumstances that you may be going through, just push through it

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Bottom line, your body is a temple, and you have to treat it that way. That's how God designed it

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a prideful person when it comes to competition

Quote.Author: Ray Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be honest about who you are

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't start acting until I was in college, which was in the 70's

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: Not like Chinese food, where you eat it and then you feel hungry an hour later

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: Suddenly playing the charming bad guy was my thing

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be nice to do a movie where I didn't have to choke the girl to get her

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: As soon as I became proactive in producing my own stuff, I started getting other roles

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, for Blow I had to age from 20 to 60, starting out in shape and then later putting on fat pads

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: I was on a soap opera before that for three years, where I was the nicest guy on earth

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people like watching edgy things

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't do anything thinking that it's going to stick

Quote.Author: Ray Liotta
Quote.QuoteValue: So, you need to balance it out with bigger and smaller movies

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: The flood of print has turned reading into a process of gulping rather than savoring

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: The streets were dark with something more than night

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: A good story cannot be devised; it has to be distilled

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: The more you reason the less you create

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I do a great deal of research - particularly in the apartments of tall blondes

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess God made Boston on a wet Sunday

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: He looked about as inconspicuous as a tarantula on a slice of angel food

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: Chess is as elaborate a waste of human intelligence as you can find outside an advertising agency

Quote.Author: Raymond Chandler
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly admire people who do things

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot to be thankful for. I am healthy, happy and I am loved

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: I just try not to judge. Don't judge me, and I won't judge you

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: Be different, stand out, and work your butt off

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: All the money in the world can't buy you back good health

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a strong woman is very important to me. But doing it all on my own is not

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: Besides, I'm a gypsy at heart and I like to travel around

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's a wonderful time for a woman

Quote.Author: Reba McEntire
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learned a lot about myself and come to deal with a lot of things that, at first, bothered me

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had horrible Valentine's Days

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I always look for contradiction in a character

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not consciously avoiding doing a lot of period drama, but I don't really seek it out either

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so rare that I get to do something in my own accent in my own hometown

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Lentil dhal is the only thing I can cook

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: If you act scared, your body produces adrenaline

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like talking about myself, if I'm honest

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a really pretentious teenager

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I've played an awful lot of repressed people

Quote.Author: Rebecca Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: It's one thing to think about something, but it's another thing to actually feel it

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Shibuya is a trendy part of Tokyo where young people come to meet and have a good time

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: There is respect for law, and then there is complicity in lawlessness

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Increasingly, people have very little tolerance for anything that smacks of propaganda

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: There has been a rising tide of criticism about China's treatment of foreign companies

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether or not Americans supported George W. Bush, they could not avoid learning about Abu Ghraib

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet is an empowering force for people who are protesting against the abuse of power

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: The relationship between citizens and government is increasingly mediated through the Internet

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Every news organization needs a social media strategy

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Taiwan politics certainly is colorful

Quote.Author: Rebecca MacKinnon
Quote.QuoteValue: Governance is a way of organizing, amplifying, and constraining power

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Even when I'm playing someone named 'Fat Amy.' I'm all about confidence and attitude

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: There are so many glamorous actresses, but you know what? In the real world, nobody looks like that

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a kid, you don't want to be teased

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Work hard to achieve integrity in your work and your relationships with the people you work with

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to have the stamina to work 16 hours a day. I may eat a lot, but I am very healthy

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Russell Crowe is a brilliant actor

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to take things one step at a time, because the entertainment industry is very uncertain

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love it when the director says, 'Rebel, just do whatever you want.' I'm, like, 'Yes!'

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I do acting for the awards... and cash money

Quote.Author: Rebel Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love talking in an American accent. Even though it hurts my face after a few hours

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Several experts on the Middle East concur that the Middle East cannot be democratized

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I take the debate on the method of promoting democracy seriously

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: However, democracy cannot be defined as the existence of parliaments and elections alone

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a person who is inclined to define relations between individuals based on principles

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is like a streetcar. When you come to your stop, you get off

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever our Lord says, whatever our beloved Prophet says, we shall follow that path

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Family planning, birth control, no Muslim family can practice such an understanding

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Nazism is still widespread in the West

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Jerusalem is holy to three religions. You have to respect that

Quote.Author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Every country needs a strong leader in order to progress

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: All men make mistakes, but married men find out about them sooner

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: Any kid will run any errand for you, if you ask at bedtime

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: Exercise? I get it on the golf course. When I see my friends collapse, I run for the paramedics

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I personally believe we were put here to build and not to destroy

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what your heartache may be, laughing helps you forget it for a few seconds

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm nuts and I know it. But so long as I make 'em laugh, they ain't going to lock me up

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: His death was the first time that Ed Wynn ever made anyone sad

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: I left home because I was hungry

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: Congress: Bingo with billions

Quote.Author: Red Skelton
Quote.QuoteValue: God's children and their happiness are my reasons for being

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: Broadcast TV is like the landline of 20 years ago

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there will be 20 years of evolution from linear broadcast to internet television

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: In 20 years from now we will all be able to click and watch TV

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate the photo shoots. I hate all that stuff

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: In hindsight, I slid into arrogance based upon past success

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: I've worked very hard, but my life's always been fun

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: On the Internet you get continuous innovation, so every year the streams are a little better

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: Stone Age. Bronze Age. Iron Age. We define entire epics of humanity by the technology they use

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a finite market for DVD-by-mail, and the growth over the next 10 years will be in streaming

Quote.Author: Reed Hastings
Quote.QuoteValue: Great leaders, like Steve Jobs or Jeff Bezos, also focused on the long term

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody needs love. Everyone deserves it

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence is everything in this business

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: I get crazy in a bookstore. It makes my heart beat hard because I want to buy everything

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: I started working on trying to sound like June from the very beginning

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: It really bothers me when people don't use coasters. Particularly on my table

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: When a police officer tells you to stay in the car, you stay in the car

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what I would have done so many times in my life if I hadn't had my girlfriends

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: Lord knows, every day is not a success, every year is not a success. You have to celebrate the good

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: I literally think I look bad in every picture

Quote.Author: Reese Witherspoon
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no bad consequence to loving fully, with all your heart. You always gain by giving love

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Fans don't boo nobodies

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the best in baseball

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't come to New York to be a star, I brought my star with me

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind getting beaten, but I hate to lose

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: The only difference between me and those other great Yankees is my skin color

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Hitting is better than sex

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was reminded that when we lose and I strike out, a billion people in China don't care

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Babe Ruth was great. I'm just lucky

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: If I played in New York, they'd name a candy bar after me

Quote.Author: Reggie Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: I represent both the underdog and the overdog in our society

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: No one really has a bad life. Not even a bad day. Just bad moments

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: Be eccentric now. Don't wait for old age to wear purple

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to chocolate, resistance is futile

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of life is showing up. You do the best you can, which varies from day to day

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: There are few places you can find silence. Air travel could be the last fortress of solitude

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: If a relationship has to be a secret, you shouldn't be in it

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: What other people think of you is none of your business

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how you feel, get up, dress up and show up

Quote.Author: Regina Brett
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easier to forgive those who hurt you than those who hurt the people you love
